comment.author: 27112342@N03
comment._content:
This is a treasure house of Olden Goldies.  What a foresight you people must be having.  Wonderful . Every image here is worth a fortune.  We view each one of them and love it. 

You are doing a great service to man kind. Best wishes

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi Sunciti Sundaram,

Thanks for your kind comments! We love being able to share these great collections. For years they were available only to people who could visit Brooklyn, but now we can send them worldwide. 

Here's to Flickr and all our friends here!
Deb Wythe
Digital Lab
